entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
